description: This curry is both satisfying and cheap. Yoghurt adds creaminess to the sauce – just be careful not to overcook it, as it will separate.
keywords: Indian curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Black-eyed Bean, Spinach & Tomato Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 green chillies, slit lengthways and deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the mustard seeds. When they start to pop, add the garlic, curry leaves, and onion. Cook over a medium heat for 5 minutes, or until the onion is soft.
Add the green chillies, chilli powder, coriander, and turmeric. Mix well and add the tomato pieces. Stir, then add the spinach. Cook over a low heat for 5 minutes.

Finally, add the black-eyed beans and salt to taste. Cook for another minute, or until everything is hot. Remove the pan from the heat and slowly add the yoghurt, stirring well. Serve warm with naan breads or rice.
